title: Practice questions for C (2nd sem)?
content: Can any seniors help me out with where to find good questions for C, since I’m sorta struggling with it.

comments.body:
My teacher is good at explaining the concepts, but the thing is he doesn’t give us many examples. He uses only 1 or 2 and explains the related concept using those only.

Also..questions for c are available on pesuacademy? I can’t seem to find anything yet
Try out  "c programming: a modern approach ". I heavily relied on this for pwc
https://www.sanfoundry.com/c-interview-questions-answers/#c-chapters    ....this was given by our comp teacher...u can use it if you want
